title: MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2014 Premium 13.0.0.30 [ChingLiu]
description:
All new features in MAGIX Movie Edit Pro 2014 Classic/Plus/Premium 

- Proxy editing* 
- Intel WIDI support*
- Transition preview in HD (Content) 
- Optimized handles for image size/adjusting positions with integrated rotation handle
- Import MET projects
- Selected touch elements 
- Optimized toolbar in the Timeline
- Use Dolby/Win 8 Codecs
- 4K Support
- No more MVC activation*
- Adjustments for new plugins: embedded interface possible (proDAD Defishr)
- Redesigned program settings/Performance options
- Render dialog
- Redesigned export and playback device templates
- Adjustments made to the toolbar (direct access to mouse modes)
- Adjustments made to dialogs to fit program design (CD-import)
- Swap channels for multistream 3D files*
- Reduced amount of memory needed when often using color correction
- Option for automatic waveform creation when importing
- Improve import compatibility
- New, more flexible format for takes
- Premium extra proDAD Heroglyph V4 PRO**
- Premium extra NewBlue ColorFast** 

Redesigned timecode display* 
- Flexible, positionable objects
- Optional display of recording time 

Support for high DPI
- GUI automatically adjusts to different display pixel densities
- Possible to manually switch size of GUI elements in the program settings window 

Transition dialogs
- Embedded GUI
- Adjustments to various parameters
- Improved presets in the alpha transitions 

New content 
- Movie templates*
- Intros/Outros
- Film looks*
- DVD menus
- Slideshow maker styles
- Decorative elements 

Performance optimizations (particularly to multitrack performance) 
- Faster audio decoding
- Quality scaling during realtime playback
- Intelligent disc preloading
- Multithread optimization
- Optimizations to color conversion 
- Optimizations to preview scaling
* Porting of various effects for GPU (blur, sharpen, HDR)
* Porting of transitions on GPU (leaves, waves, shutter)
* Optimizations to display in storyboard mode when working on large projects 

New and improved video effects
- HDR effect* 
- Adjustments to GUI blur/sharpen 
- Soft keyframing blur 
- Smoother look for artistic blur 

New and improved audio effects
- Wind/Rumble filter
- Mastering Suite 4* 

*Only available in the Plus/Premium versions 
**Only available in the Premium version

Supported operating systems

For Microsoft Windows XP | Vista | 7 | 8 (32-bit and 64-bit)

Minimum System Requirements

All MAGIX programs are developed with user-friendliness in mind so that all the basic features run smoothly and can be fully controlled, even on low-performance computers. Check your operating systemÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s control panel for technical information about your computer. 

-Processor: Dual core processor with 2.0 GHz
-RAM: 1 GB
-Onboard graphics card with a screen resolution of at least 1024 x 768 
-Sound card: Internal sound card 
-Hard drive space: 2 GB for program installation
-Optical drive: DVD drive (only for installation of the box version)
-Internet connection: An Internet connection is required to activate the software

Language : English
